snippet: Help was provided for a Staten Island man who had been struggling to keep his house when he was told he had a serious health problem.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York helps Jose Perez of Staten Island, who has renal failure, get support he needs to feed his family and pay his bills.
lead_paragraph: Help was provided for a Staten Island man who had been struggling to keep his house when he was told he had a serious health problem.

headline.print_headline: Working Three Jobs to Try to Dig Out of Debt, and Encountering a Startling Diagnosis
headline.seo: For Father Working Three Jobs, a Startling Diagnosis
headline.main: For Father Working Three Jobs, a Startling Diagnosis
